definition: to post (an item on a forum)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
fitting snugly/appropriate/suitable/variant of 貼|贴[tie1]/to paste/to obey
invitation card/notice
rubbing from incised inscription

sentences.english: Now the post has become an effective means of promotion.
sentences.chinese: 現在發帖子成爲人們進行推廣的一種有效手段。

sentences.english: In both cases the women accused of posting the profiles denied it.
sentences.chinese: 兩個案子中，被指稱發帖的女性都矢口否認。

sentences.english: Nobody will publish your guest posts, and nobody will link to you.
sentences.chinese: 沒人會發表你的來賓發帖，也不會有人鏈接你。

sentences.english: Ahhh. Now go drink something strong, it's time to talk about posting.
sentences.chinese: 現在喝些提神的飲料，因爲我們要開始討論發帖了。

sentences.english: This is the story: about three years ago, they posted their the articles.
sentences.chinese: 那是三年前，他們在清地發帖子。

sentences.english: I was the only one who do not wish to post.
sentences.chinese: 希望不要只有我一個人發帖。

sentences.english: Postings are anonymous, which encourages users to give unvarnished views.
sentences.chinese: 發帖都是匿名的，這鼓勵用戶提出真實的觀點。

sentences.english: Still go studying moss-grown person energy of life and hair post measure.
sentences.chinese: 還是去學習落伍的人氣和發帖數量吧。

sentences.english: After the event, please post a follow-up activities will be reported.
sentences.chinese: 活動結束後，請及時將活動內容進行後續發帖報道。

sentences.english: The poster said they had suspicions of physical symptoms of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 發帖者說，他們的身體出現疑似艾滋病症狀。

sentences.english: In the body of post write amount of posts and your e-currency account.
sentences.chinese: 在帖子裏註明你發帖數量和你的網銀。

sentences.english: Postings to the new category would cost $10 and can be renewed for $5.
sentences.chinese: 新類別的發帖費是10美元，續期費是5美元。

sentences.english: Which is why today's posts are a bit less than usual.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼今天的發帖數比平時的少呢？

sentences.english: His face looks familiar. Seems he was introduced before somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 小盆友有點面熟，好像以前發帖介紹過他。

sentences.english: Current, this sends Cong Mou of bloodguilty of post offer a reward to already was detained by public security on the net.
sentences.chinese: 目前，這位在網上發帖懸賞殺人的叢某已被治安拘留。

sentences.english: Please post it on Chinese forum.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想用中文發帖，請到中文論壇。

definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to make a speech/statement/utterance/CL:個|个[ge4]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
online
as for/when it comes to
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to come in
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to stand in a circle and watch
to disturb/to look for trouble/to stir up a row/to bother sb intentionally
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
to swear or curse (at people)/to scold or yell at someone
group
